text: Wendy & Peter Pan is a play by Ella Hickson, adapted from J.M. Barrie's original play and novel Peter Pan. The story is a retelling of the classic children's tale, featuring Wendy Darling as the protagonist who flies away with Peter Pan to Neverland. The play was first performed at the Royal Shakespeare Company in 2013 and has since had revivals at the same theater in 2015-2016, as well as productions at the Royal Lyceum Theatre in Edinburgh and the Leeds Playhouse. Category:2013 works Category:21st-century plays
title: Wendy & Peter Pan
